Interfaces

Interface Range

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sheet.Column, Sheet.Range, Sheet.Row

    public interface Range
    The range class is used to select a range of Cell instances from the current Sheet.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Maarten Flikkema

    • Method Summary

        boolean isSingleCell()
        Determine if the range contains a single Cell
        Returns:
        true if this Cell contains only one Cell

        Returns:
        the first Cell in this Range, or null if empty

        Parameters:
        cell - Cell
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        amount of cells in this Range
